sqlMap.select:
select f_id, f_name, f_user_scope, f_scope_radius, f_use_limit, f_aoe_type, f_hurt_consideration_way, f_type, f_hurt_value, f_duration, f_pre_duration, f_effect_repeat_option, f_effect_repeat_count, f_special_effect_change, f_effect_repeat_type, f_desc, f_hurt_adds, f_percent, f_type_pn, f_jitui_distance, f_icon_id, f_effect_id, f_goodmodel_id, f_buff_flag, f_is_die_clean, f_hurt_value_min, f_hurt_value_max, f_attacker_is_ide_clean, f_du_max_hurt, f_clips_desc, f_name_i18n, f_desc_i18n, f_clips_desc_i18n from t_skill_effect
order by $orderByClause$

select f_id, f_name, f_user_scope, f_scope_radius, f_use_limit, f_aoe_type, f_hurt_consideration_way, f_type, f_hurt_value, f_duration, f_pre_duration, f_effect_repeat_option, f_effect_repeat_count, f_special_effect_change, f_effect_repeat_type, f_desc, f_hurt_adds, f_percent, f_type_pn, f_jitui_distance, f_icon_id, f_effect_id, f_goodmodel_id, f_buff_flag, f_is_die_clean, f_hurt_value_min, f_hurt_value_max, f_attacker_is_ide_clean, f_du_max_hurt, f_clips_desc, f_name_i18n, f_desc_i18n, f_clips_desc_i18n from t_skill_effect where f_id = #id:INTEGER#
